mapper.select: SELECT MBSP_EMAIL, MBSP_ID, MBSP_NAME, MBSP_ZIPCODE FROM MBSP_TBL
mapper.update: UPDATE MBSP_TBL SET MBSP_EMAIL = #{mbsp_email}, MBSP_ZIPCODE = #{mbsp_zipcode}, MBSP_ADDR = #{mbsp_addr}, MBSP_DEADDR = #{mbsp_deaddr}, MBSP_PHONE = #{mbsp_phone}, MBSP_UPDATEDATE = sysdate WHERE MBSP_ID = #{mbsp_id}
